question:
Which among the following come under the purview of World Trade Organization?
  1. Trade Policy Review Mechanism (TPRM)
  2. Global System of Trade Preferences (GSTP)
  3. Trade Negotiations Committee (TNC)
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Global System of Trade Preferences among Developing Countries (GSTP) is a preferential trade agreement signed on 13 April 1988 with the aim of increasing trade between developing countries in the framework of the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD).
